Text: Really? another single rar file of many many gigs?  does anyone ever get to finish DLing these?  I've never been able to get single files this big before people stop seeding them.  What would be wrong with splitting this into sepperate files of each catagory (photos, videos, people, vehicles, etc)?

Don't worry, I'll be seeding for a long time. I already have it all organized in my own system, so separating everything out into new archives would have been quite an effort. Not to mention, I just wanted to get a torrent up quickly for some people who wanted the whole set from /hr/
